Package Restaurant

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
Restaurant.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
A Menu object that contains all menu items/set packages

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Menu()
    Menu constructor Reads in the menu items/set package from text files

    • updateMenuToFile

      public void updateMenuToFile(ArrayList<MenuItem> menuItems, String menuType) throws IOException
      Updates menu items that were created/removed/updated to the respective menu item type text file
      Parameters:
      menuItems - Takes in the all menu items from the menu items array
      menuType - Takes in the type of menu item to update
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown when reading/writing to text file, an I/O exception occurs

    • printDrinkLTEPrice

      public void printDrinkLTEPrice(double price)
      Prints only drinks less than or equal to the inputted price Called when customer orders a set package, and they are selecting the drink they want Each set package has a maximum drink price attribute that specifies which drinks can be ordered for that particular set package
      Parameters:
      price - The maximum drink price specified of each set package

    • getMenuItemFromID

      public MenuItem getMenuItemFromID(int ID)
      Method to return the specific menu item (of MenuItem type) based on the inputted ID Index starting with 1 represents main course Index starting with 2 represents sides Index starting with 3 represents drinks Index starting with 4 represents dessert
      Parameters:
      ID - Identifies the menu item inputted
      Returns:
      The menu item (of MenuItem type) found from the particular inputted valid ID

    • getSetPackageItemFromID

      public Restaurant.SetPackage getSetPackageItemFromID(int ID)
      Method to return the specific set package item (of SetPackage type) based on the inputted ID Index starting with 5 represents set package
      Parameters:
      ID - Identifies the set package item inputted
      Returns:
      The set package item (of SetPackage type) found from the particular inputted valid ID

    • createNewMenuItem

      public void createNewMenuItem(String name, int menuItemType, double price, String description) throws IOException
      Creates a new menu item, and adds on to the respective menu item type arraylist Updates the respective text files accordingly
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the new menu item
      menuItemType - Menu item type of the new menu item
      price - Price of the new menu item
      description - Description of the new menu item
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown when reading/writing to text file, an I/O exception occurs

    • createNewSetPackage

      public void createNewSetPackage(String name, double price, String description, ArrayList<MenuItem> menuItems, double maxDrinkPrice) throws IOException
      Creates a new set package item, and adds on to the set package items arraylist Updates the set package text files accordingly
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the new set package item
      price - Price of the new set package item
      description - Description of the new set package item
      menuItems - The menu items that the new set package consists of
      maxDrinkPrice - Specifies the maximum drink price that is allowed to be ordered when ordering this new set package
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown when reading/writing to text file, an I/O exception occurs

    • removeMenuItem

      public void removeMenuItem(int menuItemType, int menuItemID) throws IOException
      Removes the relevant menu item based on the ID Updates the relevant arraylist and text file accordingly
      Parameters:
      menuItemType - Specifies the menu item type of the menu item to be removed
      menuItemID - Specifies the ID of the menu item to be removed
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown when reading/writing to text file, an I/O exception occurs

      Throws:
      IOException

    • checkIfNameExists

      public boolean checkIfNameExists(String newName)
      Checks that the name of a new menu/set package items exists already in the menu
      Parameters:
      newName - The user inputted name of the new menu item
      Returns:
      True if the name exists and false if not
